card.name: Hyper Goner
card.description: If you have more than 10 {{HP}}, choose a card in your hand to burn. Kill all monsters.

description.now: If you have more than 10 {{HP}}, choose a card in your hand to burn. Kill all monsters.
description.prev: Kill all monsters. This costs 1 less for every 2 {{HP}} you're missing (max: -15 {{COST}}).
